DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the safety and immunogenicity of single dose of two commercially available vaccines used to prevent Haemophilus influenzae type b infections in children 13-59 months of age.
DOC.brief_title: Immunogenicity and Safety of a Monovalent Glycoprotein-Conjugated (Diptheria Toxin -CRM197) Hib Vaccine in 13-59 Months Old Healthy Children
DOC.criteria: Infants 1359 months of age. Prior Hib vaccine administration. History of serious reaction(s) following vaccination. Any vaccination within 7 days of study vaccination. Known or suspected immune impairment. Premature (before 37th week of gestation) or birth weight less than 2500g For additional entry criteria please refer to the protocol.
